prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Campbell Family Documents, Mss. Collection 2001.26, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Ruth Ann Chitwood in 2001 as part of the W. R. Chitwood Collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two items. One is a summons to John Sexton to answer complaint of Robert Campbell for non-payment of debt and is dated 10 May 1825. The other item is a letter from Theodore P. Campbell, Dean of the General Faculty, Virginia Polytechnic Institute, Blacksburg, Virginia to Lee Howard, Floyd County, Virginia dated 1 April 1919. Campbell urges Howard to enroll in the college.
